TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供對快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具的支援，以剖析使用 XPath 運算式的資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to parse data-binding expressions that use XPath expressions.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用多載方法的這個類別，以針對實作的物件執行的 XPath 運算式的結果繫結介面，例如。You can use the overloaded method of this class to bind to the result of an XPath expression executed against an object that implements the interface, such as an . 您可以使用方法來擷取針對執行的 XPath 運算式的結果物件做為節點的清單。You can use the method to retrieve the results of an XPath expression executed against an object as an list of nodes. 此清單中的節點可以直接列舉或指派給`DataSource`屬性的清單控制項，例如或。This list of nodes can be enumerated directly or assigned to the `DataSource` property of a list control, such as a or . 使用時，您可以使用資料繫結語法的簡化的版本方法以宣告方式。You can use a simplified version of data-binding syntax when using the methods declaratively. 而不是呼叫`XPathBinder.Eval`(`Container.DataItem`， `xpath`) 您可以使用`XPath`(`xpath`)。Instead of calling `XPathBinder.Eval`(`Container.DataItem`, `xpath`) you can use `XPath`(`xpath`). 同樣地，而不是呼叫`XPathBinder.Select`(`Container.DataItem`，`xpath`)，您可以使用`XPathSelect`(`xpath`) 來擷取的節點集。Similarly, instead of calling `XPathBinder.Select`(`Container.DataItem`,`xpath`), you can use `XPathSelect`(`xpath`) to retrieve an set of nodes. 使用這個簡化的語法中，當並方法會假設預設值`Container.DataItem`內容物件。When using this simplified syntax, the and methods assume a default `Container.DataItem` context object. 如需有關資料繫結至 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about data binding to ASP.NET server controls, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此範例中有兩個部分：This example has two parts: - 顯示 XML 資料的 Web Form 頁面。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含資料的 XML 檔案。An XML file that contains the data. 此範例的第一個部分示範顯示透過存取 XML 資料的 Web Form 網頁控制項。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. A控制項會使用簡化方法語法來繫結至資料的項目內的 XML 文件的表示。A control uses simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它會使用方法來擷取清單，並將它指派為晚期繫結屬性控制項。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/CS/xmlds14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/VB/xmlds14vb.aspx#1)] 第二個範例會提供 XML 檔案中，Order.xml，如上面所定義的 Web Form 網頁中顯示的資料來源使用。The second example provides the XML file, Order.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` John Doe 1234 Tenth Avenue Bellevue Washington 98001 screwdriver hammer fixture ```

summary.span: 在執行階段針對 物件來剖析及評估 XPath 資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Parses and evaluates an XPath data-binding expression against an object at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string xPath);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string xPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, xPath As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ xPath);
static member Eval : obj * string -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的 物件參考。

span.span: The object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: xPath
param.span: 從 container 到屬性值的 XPath 查詢 (此屬性值置於繫結的控制項屬性中)。

span.span: The XPath query from container to the property value that is placed in the bound control property.

summary.span: 評估執行階段的 XPath 資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: ，從資料繫結運算式的評估產生。

span.span: An that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法以宣告方式是如果您想要簡化要在瀏覽器中顯示的文字字串的 XML 節點的轉型的時候。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed on a browser. 若要這樣做，您必須將\<%# 和 %> 標記，也會在標準的 ASP.NET 資料繫結，資料繫結運算式周圍。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 任何清單 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如， ，或，則`container`參數應該是`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`參數應該是`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 此範例中有兩個部分：This example has two parts: - 顯示 XML 資料的 Web Form 頁面。A Web Forms page that displays XML data. - 包含資料的 XML 檔案。An XML file that contains the data. 此範例的第一個部分示範顯示透過存取 XML 資料的 Web Form 網頁控制項。The first part of the example shows a Web Forms page that displays XML data accessed through an control. A控制項會使用簡化方法語法來繫結至資料的項目內的 XML 文件的表示。A control uses the simplified method syntax to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 它會使用方法來擷取清單，並將它指派為晚期繫結屬性控制項。It uses the method to retrieve an list and assign it as a late-bound property for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/CS/xmlds13cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_13/VB/xmlds13vb.aspx#1)] 第二個範例會提供 XML 檔案中，Bookstore2.xml，如上面所定義的 Web Form 網頁中顯示的資料來源使用。The second example provides the XML file, Bookstore2.xml, that is used as the source of the data displayed in the Web Forms page defined above. ``` test test2 The Handmaid's Tale 12.95 test3 test4 Pride And Prejudice 24.95 ```

span.span: The or parameter is .

exception.span: 由 所指定的物件不是 物件。

span.span: The object specified by is not an object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Eval (object container, string xPath, string format);
.method public static hidebysig string Eval(object container, string xPath, string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, xPath As String, format As String) As String

static member Eval : obj * string * string -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的 物件參考。

span.span: The object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: xPath
param.span: 從 container 到屬性值的 XPath 查詢 (此屬性值要置於繫結的控制項屬性中)。

span.span: The XPath query from the container to the property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.name: format
param.span: .NET Framework 格式字串 (類似於 所使用的字串)，會將 物件 (由資料繫結運算式評估所產生) 轉換為可以由要求之瀏覽器所顯示的 。

span.span: A .NET Framework format string, similar to those used by , that converts the object (which results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression) to a that can be displayed by the requesting browser.

summary.span: 在執行階段評估 XPath 資料繫結運算式，並將結果格式化成為文字，以顯示於提出要求的瀏覽器中。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as text to be displayed in the requesting browser.

returns.span: ，從資料繫結運算式評估和字串型別轉換產生。

span.span: A that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要深入了解.NET Framework 中的格式字串，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。To learn more about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 您可以使用方法以宣告方式是如果您想要簡化要在瀏覽器中顯示的文字字串的 XML 節點的轉型的時候。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 若要這樣做，您必須將\<%# 和 %> 標記，也會在標準的 ASP.NET 資料繫結，資料繫結運算式周圍。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 任何清單 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如， ，或，則`container`參數應該是`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`參數應該是`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string xPath, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver resolver);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string xPath, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver resolver) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, xPath As String, resolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ xPath, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ resolver);
static member Eval : obj * string * System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver -> obj

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的 物件參考。

span.span: The object reference that the expression is evaluated against.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: xPath
param.span: 從 container 到屬性值的 XPath 查詢 (此屬性值要置於繫結的控制項屬性中)。

span.span: The XPath query from the container to the property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.name: resolver
param.span: 物件，用來解析 XPath 運算式中的命名空間前置詞。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

summary.span: 透過使用 物件 (指定用於解析 XPath 運算式中的命名空間前置詞)，在執行階段評估 XPath 資料繫結運算式，並將結果格式化成為文字，以顯示於要求的瀏覽器中。

span.span: Evaluates XPath data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as text to be displayed in the requesting browser, using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

returns.span: ，從資料繫結運算式的評估產生。

span.span: A that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法以宣告方式是如果您想要簡化要在瀏覽器中顯示的文字字串的 XML 節點的轉型的時候。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the casting of an XML node to a text string to be displayed in a browser. 若要這樣做，您必須將\<%# 和 %> 標記，也會在標準的 ASP.NET 資料繫結，資料繫結運算式周圍。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the data-binding expression. 資料繫結運算式包含 XPath 運算式和物件以解析命名空間的參考。The data-binding expression includes the XPath expression and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 任何清單 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如， ，或，則`container`參數應該是`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`參數應該是`Page`。If you are binding against the page, the `container` parameter should be `Page`.

param.span: 物件，用來解析 XPath 運算式中的命名空間前置詞。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

summary.span: 透過使用 物件 (指定用於解析 XPath 運算式中的命名空間前置詞)，在執行階段使用 XPath 資料繫結運算式，以傳回節點清單。

span.span: Uses an XPath data-binding expression at run time to return a list of nodes, using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.
An list of nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法以宣告方式是如果您想要簡化一組節點使用 XPath 查詢擷取的時候。You can use the method declaratively if you want to simplify the retrieval of a set of nodes using an XPath query. 若要這樣做，您必須將放\<%# 和 %> 標記，也會在標準的 ASP.NET 資料繫結，周圍的 XPath 查詢和物件以解析命名空間的參考。To do so, you must place the \<%# and %> tags, which are also used in standard ASP.NET data binding, around the XPath query and an object to resolve the namespace reference. 任何清單 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如， ，或，則`container`參數應該是`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list ASP.NET server controls, such as , , or , the `container` parameter should be `Container.DataItem`.
